creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: copy of a painting; seated woman wearing a floral skirt and a jacket with a striped pattern and red underlayer; woman has a blue and white patterned head covering and holds a shell on a green stick; hanging rope with leaves above woman's head; red sun with clouds; text at top; text and seal at right edge below center
title: The Feast of Seven Herbs
